views.markdown:
Added support for iOS 9.3.3 - Added support for iOS 9 -Tweak can be disabled when the device is locked
-Bug fixes

-Popup on lockscreen stays on top of notifications and passcode number pad
-Safe mode can be disabled on lockscreen

-Tweak now works also on lockscreen
-Invoking menu disables background touch
-Changed double tap to single tap
-Minor changes in the settings pane

-Added support for Activator
-Added support for BioProtect
-You can now hide the Safe Mode entry
-Added a dark theme
-Fixed a memory leak

- Added Safe mode option
- Popup can be dismissed by either pressing the home button or double-tapping outside the menu
